title: post api chats save chat message
description: Verify that the POST /api/chats endpoint correctly saves a chat message with user authentication, validates input data, and returns appropriate success or error responses.

title: get api chats retrieve chat history
description: Verify that the GET /api/chats endpoint retrieves the authenticated user's chat history with pagination and filtering, ensuring user-scoped data isolation and correct response format.

title: delete api chats delete chat message
description: Verify that the DELETE /api/chats/:id endpoint deletes a specific chat message belonging to the authenticated user and returns appropriate success or error responses.

title: post api ragstores create rag store

title: get api ragstores retrieve user rag stores

title: get api ragstores retrieve specific rag store

title: put api ragstores update rag store
description: Verify that the PUT /api/ragstores/:name endpoint updates the specified RAG store's details for the authenticated user and returns appropriate success or error responses.

title: delete api ragstores delete rag store and chats

title: get health check endpoint
